Sentencas: It is essential to develop efficient and stable cathode materials operated at intermediate temperature for the application of solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Co and Hf co-doped BaFeO3 cathode with obviously enhanced catalytic activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this work, BaFeO3-delta based perovskite oxide was used to explore the influence of Co and Hf co-doping on the catalytic activity and CO2 tolerance of SOFC cathode materials.
Titulo: Co and Hf co-doped BaFeO3 cathode with obviously enhanced catalytic activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Among the series materials, BaCo0.2Fe0.7Hf0.1O3-delta (BC2FHO) shows excellent catalytic activity and CO2 stability.
Titulo: Co and Hf co-doped BaFeO3 cathode with obviously enhanced catalytic activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The EIS measurement shows that the polarization resistance (R-p) of BC2FHO is similar to 0.04 Omega cm(2) at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Co and Hf co-doped BaFeO3 cathode with obviously enhanced catalytic activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In the CO2 tolerance test, the Rp decreases to similar to 0.0435 Omega cm(2) within 1 h after removing 10% CO2.
Titulo: Co and Hf co-doped BaFeO3 cathode with obviously enhanced catalytic activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The peak power density of the single cell with BC2FHO cathode are 1010.4, 649.4, and 256.6 mW cm(-2) at 800, 700, and 600 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Co and Hf co-doped BaFeO3 cathode with obviously enhanced catalytic activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: And the total degradation rate of the output voltage at 700 degrees C is only 0.009% h(-1).
Titulo: Co and Hf co-doped BaFeO3 cathode with obviously enhanced catalytic activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The significantly enhanced activity and stability are attributed to Co and Hf co-doping.
Titulo: Co and Hf co-doped BaFeO3 cathode with obviously enhanced catalytic activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The incorporation of Hf allows BaFeO3 to obtain a highly symmetrical cubic structure with increased oxygen ion transport channels, which is conducive to promote the oxygen reduction reaction.
Titulo: Co and Hf co-doped BaFeO3 cathode with obviously enhanced catalytic activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, Hf-doping can also increase the acidity to make the material resistant to CO2.
Titulo: Co and Hf co-doped BaFeO3 cathode with obviously enhanced catalytic activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The incorporation of Co improves the concentration of oxygen vacancies, which makes BC2FHO show excellent electrochemical performance.
Titulo: Co and Hf co-doped BaFeO3 cathode with obviously enhanced catalytic activity and CO2 tolerance for solid oxide fuel cell
